sections.heading: covenant, defined.Restrictive covenant shall mean any specification limiting the transfer, rental, or lease of any housing because of race, creed, religion, color, national origin, sex, disability, familial status, ancestry, or military or veteran status

sections.text:
20-317.Restrictive covenant, defined.

Restrictive covenant shall mean any specification limiting the transfer, rental, or lease of any housing because of race, creed, religion, color, national origin, sex, disability, familial status, ancestry, or military or veteran status.

SourceLaws 1991, LB 825, ยง 18;Laws 2021, LB540, ยง 18;Laws 2025, LB150, ยง 12.Operative Date: September 3, 2025
